channel.title: Comments on: My New Best Friends

item.title: By: Troggdor
item.dc:creator: Troggdor
item.description:
I tried GW today for a couple of hours. Friend let me make a char on his acount. WOW that game needs a LOT of work on it's interface and "teaching" newb players like myself how to play the game. My first impression is that the game is REALY bad. It's basicly Diablo 2 but with less polish.
The world design is horrible although it looks fairly pritty. Whats with not being able to jump? What's with those pain in the ass "invisible" walls? ARG. And that 8 spells only thing? Jeez that's anoying. I can see all the people who loved playing Diablo 2 liking this game, but i also see the game lasting for only a year TOPS.
I dont doubt that the game will become a mega hit in Korea as a lot of online games do in that area of the world.
Small side note: What's with almost all of the male necromancer faces looking asian? I felt like i was playing Lineage: The Bloodpledge when i was designing my necro. har har har
item.content:encoded:
I tried GW today for a couple of hours. Friend let me make a char on his acount. WOW that game needs a LOT of work on it’s interface and “teaching” newb players like myself how to play the game. My first impression is that the game is REALY bad. It’s basicly Diablo 2 but with less polish.

The world design is horrible although it looks fairly pritty. Whats with not being able to jump? What’s with those pain in the ass “invisible” walls? ARG. And that 8 spells only thing? Jeez that’s anoying. I can see all the people who loved playing Diablo 2 liking this game, but i also see the game lasting for only a year TOPS.

I dont doubt that the game will become a mega hit in Korea as a lot of online games do in that area of the world.

Small side note: What’s with almost all of the male necromancer faces looking asian? I felt like i was playing Lineage: The Bloodpledge when i was designing my necro. har har har

item.title: By: Jiffy
item.dc:creator: Jiffy
item.description: Damn you for making me buy this. *installs*
item.content:encoded: Damn you for making me buy this. *installs*

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: Added register/login link to footer. Was starting to annoy me also with no link.
item.content:encoded: Added register/login link to footer. Was starting to annoy me also with no link.

item.title: By: Spoons
item.dc:creator: Spoons
item.description:
Reading this after playing Republic Commando gives me visions of squad based MMOs...
And yeah I know about the korean one but really, all those ragnarok online clones have turned me off korean MMOs for good. That and the janglish gets old fast.
item.content:encoded:
Reading this after playing Republic Commando gives me visions of squad based MMOs…

And yeah I know about the korean one but really, all those ragnarok online clones have turned me off korean MMOs for good. That and the janglish gets old fast.

item.title: By: UnionCarbide
item.dc:creator: UnionCarbide
item.description:
Hah. Just yesterday you were belittling the use of henchmen. NOW look at you!
BTW, it looks like the login link is missing from your page now, or I'm just too dumb to find it. I couldn't log in using my RSS reader and had to ZOMG open my actual web browser. BLIZZ FIX PLS KTHX.
item.content:encoded:
Hah. Just yesterday you were belittling the use of henchmen. NOW look at you!

BTW, it looks like the login link is missing from your page now, or I’m just too dumb to find it. I couldn’t log in using my RSS reader and had to ZOMG open my actual web browser. BLIZZ FIX PLS KTHX.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: Anyone is welcome to use Nukey, but Healee and I have something special.
item.content:encoded: Anyone is welcome to use Nukey, but Healee and I have something special.

item.title: By: Ethic
item.dc:creator: Ethic
item.description: Truth. The quality of the henchmen is one of the primary reasons why I purchased the game. Solo when you want, group when you want, or group with henchmen and still be solo (technically).
item.content:encoded: Truth. The quality of the henchmen is one of the primary reasons why I purchased the game. Solo when you want, group when you want, or group with henchmen and still be solo (technically).

item.title: By: Jiffy
item.dc:creator: Jiffy
item.description: Damnit Foton. You're just *trying* to get me to buy this game, aren't you?
item.content:encoded: Damnit Foton. You’re just *trying* to get me to buy this game, aren’t you?
